treatment.description: Stems erect, subtended by ovate scales. Leaves 2--3; blade terete or semi-terete, apex acute to obtuse, lacunae 2; veins 1--2[--7--10], midrib inconspicuous, not obviously widened distally, lateral veins inconspicuous, not ending in tooth. Inflorescences cymose. Flowers axillary to bract, inflated sheath present. Staminate flowers: anthers attached at same height on axis. Pistillate flowers sessile, styles divided into 2 long stigmas. Fruits drupaceous, obovoid [ellipsoid], quadrangular in cross section.
treatment.global_distribution: warm oceanic waters of both hemispheres.
